mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbMemberMaster ( memNo, memTypeCd, memId, memNm, nickNm, phone, email, gender, birth, viewType ) VALUES ( #{memNo}, #{memTypeCd}, #{memId}, #{memNm}, #{nickNm}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{birth}, '01' )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbMemberMaster SET passwordNo = #{passwordNo}, regUser = #{memNo}, regDt = NOW() WHERE memNo = #{memNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbMemberPassword ( passwordNo, memNo, password, regUser, regDt ) VALUES ( #{passwordNo}, #{memNo}, #{password}, #{memNo}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT tmbm.memNo , tmbm.memTypeCd , tmbm.memId , tmbm.password , tmbm.memNm , tmbm.phone , tmbm.email , tmbm.gender , tmbm.birth , tmbm.viewType FROM tbMemberMaster tmbm WHERE memId = #{memId} AND viewType != '04'
